video_prompt: Transition through a futuristic city nestled in a fjord: ships navigate, lights glow from windows, elevated bridges bustle with unseen activity. The city hums with internal life against a backdrop of shifting mountain mists. Architectural details subtly reconfigure, and metallic structures gleam with dynamic light changes.
image_prompt: Futuristic city with industrial Gothic architecture blending seamlessly into a mountainous fjord. Features towering, spired metallic buildings, intricate interconnections, and a bustling port with advanced vessels. Soft, diffused lighting highlights the muted silver, grey, and bronze palette against a dramatic natural backdrop.
refined_video_prompt: The view dynamically sweeps through a futuristic fjord-city. Vessels actively navigate winding channels, while window lights consistently pulse and intensify. Elevated bridges ceaselessly bustle with unseen activity. Mountain mists continuously shift and billow, altering the background. Architectural elements subtly reconfigure, reshaping their forms. Metallic structures dynamically gleam, reflecting profound, fluid light changes, suggesting active internal processes.
